page.title: 10A DAY IN OUR LIVES...
page.content: {A Day in Our Lives ------------------ A Day in Our Lives features not one life but comments from many children in an effort to reflect a range of life styles. I woke up at seven o'clock and got out of bed at 7:15.I had a wash, brushed my teeth and got dressed. I went downstairs, let the cat in and fed it.My Dad came downstairs and cut some tomatoes and cucumber up for our tortoises. I packed my swimming hat and costume and then my Mum drove me to the leisure centre at Clements Hall. After my swimming lesson my Mum drove me to school. When I got to school I distributed the registers and my friend fed the hamsters.
